TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k oʊ l s t ɛ l ɐ æ s k h ɜː t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð ɪ s t ɪ n s w ɪ ð h ɜː f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t oʊ s ɪ k s p oʊ n s ʌ v f ɹ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v θ ɪ k s l æ b z ʌ v b l uː tʃ z æ n d m eɪ b i ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b ɔː b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t ɔːɹ f ɹ ɔ ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð ɪ s t ə n s ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː ɪ l ɡ oʊ m ɪ t h ɜː w ɛ n z d ɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ æ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
